page.title: 05The Schools that are now
page.content: This school was built in 1903, which is 82 years ago. The school is very old and there were girls and boys in the school; but now there are only boys. There are lots of changes now. The classrooms have got a group of children - about 20 or 30 children in one classroom. The classes have got their own share of work around the school because we don't walk around the school because we have it in the classroom. The classrooms have changed, the artroom was the PE centre and the staffroom was a classroom. The Secretary's office was the staffroom and the dinner centre wasn't built.
